mapper.select: SELECT id, title, `desc`, image, image_width AS imageWidth, image_height AS imageHeight, is_available AS isAvailable, create_time AS createTime FROM special_activity WHERE id=#{id} AND is_available = 1

SELECT id, special_activity_id AS saId, short_title AS shortTitle, long_title AS longTitle, `desc`, is_display AS isDisplay, sequence, create_time AS createTime FROM special_activity_layout WHERE is_display = 1 AND special_activity_id = #{activityId} ORDER BY sequence DESC LIMIT 9

SELECT id, special_activity_layout_id AS layoutId, display_type AS displayType, one_image AS oneImage, one_type AS oneType, one_display_id AS oneDisplayId, one_desc AS oneDesc, one_height AS oneHeight, one_width AS oneWidth, two_image AS twoImage, two_type AS twoType, two_display_id AS twoDisplayId, two_desc AS twoDesc, two_width AS twoWidth, two_height AS twoHeight, sequence AS sequence FROM special_activity_layout_product WHERE is_display = 1 AND special_activity_layout_id = #{layoutId} ORDER BY sequence DESC
SELECT id,title,image,is_available AS isAvailable FROM special_activity_new WHERE id=#{id} AND is_available=1
SELECT title, keyword, `desc`, product_id AS productId FROM special_activity_new_product WHERE special_activity_new_id=#{specialActivityNewId} AND type=#{type} AND is_display=1 ORDER BY sequence DESC
SELECT count(id) FROM special_activity_new_product WHERE special_activity_new_id=#{specialActivityNewId} AND type=#{type} AND is_display=1
SELECT id, title, is_available as isAvailable FROM special_activity_group WHERE id=#{id}
SELECT * FROM special_activity_group_product WHERE special_activity_group_id=#{activityId} AND type=#{type} AND is_display = 1 ORDER BY sequence DESC
select id, title, image, image_width as imageWidth, image_height as imageHeight, is_available as isAvailable from special_activity_model where id=#{id}

select id, special_activity_model_id as specialActivityModelId, title, image, image_width as imageWidth, image_height as imageHeight, is_display as isDisplay, sequence from special_activity_model_layout where special_activity_model_id = #{id} and is_display=1 order by sequence
